title: App is not available on Pixel 4 even though publisher says it should be
content:
I go to https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.freestylelibre.app.ch, click Install and then I see the Pixel 4 listed but disabled "This item is not compatible with your device."

I called the technical team and they told me the only requirement of the app is Android >= 5 and an NFC sensor. Pixel 4 has both so our conclusion was that it's a Google Store issue.

Since the "FreeStyle LibreLink - CH" app is specifically for Switzerland, they directed me to check on the phone in Google Play > Account and I confirm the country is "Switzerland".

Can anybody from Google help to figure out why the app is not available?
Is there a different better channel for contacting Google about this?
Would it be more easy for the publisher to do this than me, a nobody user?
